text_block_list.text: Today, I was accompanying Matikanetannhauser for her photoshoot as the model for the academy's poster.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hannya ka~, funnya ka~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I was praying to the charm so the photoshoot would go well!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The charm on my ribbon is something I got from Fuku-chan-senpai~♪
And so, Matikanetannhauser told me about the charm on her outfit——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: What!! Omachi-san! You're getting a new outfit, aren't you—!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, it's the Thanksgiving Festival uniform! That's right! It's a new outfit!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: You're serving as the Oni General, right? Then——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I'll ask Shiraoki-sama to grant you the power of victory, Omachi-san!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: If we do that, I'm sure you'll definitely shine at the Thanksgiving Festival~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Here we go~! Hannya ka~! Funnya ka~! Kashikomi~ kashiko——

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur in the Hallway
text_block_list.text: Daaah!! Shut up!! You're making a racket first thing in the morning!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We got kicked out, huh...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: No...! This must be a message from Shiraoki-sama!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: It's probably telling us to go outside and borrow the power of various gods too!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Alright! Now that we know, we must act quickly! Let's go pay our respects right away!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Bai arya~, dare arya~, godo godo~ fin!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Three Goddesses~! Please lend us your power~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: To have our wish heard, let's offer a thank-you gift in advance!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Okay! I brought cookies~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hah, hah, hah!
Why do we have to run all the way there~?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It's to make the gods understand—
that this is a wish I truly want granted!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haa haa... This is the Kamibakari area, right~?
Why did we have to come all the way here...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huff huff...
This is said to be a place where gods reside!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Since we're asking the gods for their power,
we must at least make our wish up close!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
With reverence~ with reverence~!
Please lend your power to Omachi-san~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Whew~, just before curfew! Whew, but it's great
we could borrow so much power, isn't it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Huh...? It feels like power is drifting
around Omachi-san...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Could it be that the power is leaking out!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, huh? Where? From where!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: W-we have to put it into something quickly—

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's it! Let's put it in my charm!
Omachi-san, gather up the power!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Understood! Heave-ho! Heave-ho!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur in the Hallway
text_block_list.text: Shut up!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...and that's what happened!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So when I pray with this charm...
I feel courage welling up somehow!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
How should I put it...
Fuku-chan-senpai is, to me—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Always bright and positive...
Like an older sister I look up to!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
That senpai prayed for my success...!
Then I have to live up to that~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...thinking that makes me want to do my best!
choice_data_list: I have to take a good photo to show her
We have to take a good photo to show her
I'll pray along with you too!
I'll pray along with you too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...That's what I think to keep myself motivated!
choice_data_list: I've gotta take a good photo to show you.
We've gotta take a good photo to show you.
I'll pray along with you too!
I'll pray along with you too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! I plan to show it to you first thing after I take it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll aim for a miraculous shot that we can all celebrate together~!
After that, Matikanetannhauser finished the shoot splendidly, striking a pose as if something had taken hold of her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Um, according to Fukukitaru-senpai—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: She says that praying in this direction today brings even more "good fortune"!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hannya ka~, funnya ka~. ...Now, let's do it together!
Whether it was due to the good fortune from praying with her in a corner of the photo studio, the shoot turned out splendidly successful.
